title: Skin deep
creator_contributor_role: Tasmanian Government Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cancer - Research

description: Illustrates the work of the Peter McCallum Clinic in Launceston, Tasmania, with particular reference to the treatment of cancer by X-ray machine and cobalt bomb. The central character is a patient with early cancer who finds that early treatment leads to cure.
